director.name: 格斯·范·桑特 Gus Van Sant

this_title: John Mayer Trio: Who Did You Think I Was
introduction: Despite the single for "Who Did You Think I Was" being the version from the trio's live album, the music video of the song was a studio recording specifically for the purpose of the video itself. The music video features the trio in a worn-down factory or warehouse playing the song. In certain shots, the cameras are intentionally clearly visible to make the video have a "put-together" feel.
chinese_title: John Mayer Trio: Who Did You Think I Was
